name: Black Mask
description: PhiAcademy Black Mask is intensive mask with a moist afterfeel deep cleans the skin, ridding it of impurities and excess sebum. Purifies and soothes skin with unique properties of Silt – contains the highest quality earth clays to unclog pores and absorb excess oil. Leaves skin looked polished and smooth. Helps to noticeably refine the appearance of pores.
